settings.title: How do I switch between Fahrenheit & Celsius?
settings.content: Locate the ‘Memory’ and ‘Mode’ buttons on the side of the thermometer. Hold both buttons down simultaneously until you hear a beep.

settings.title: What are Otto's dimensions once folded?
settings.content: The Otto is designed to fold compactly, simplifying storage or stowing in your vehicle. Folded dimensions are 21.125" w x 21.25" d x 13.625" h.

settings.title: How do I switch from Body temperature mode to measuring Food/Liquid temperatures?
settings.content: Locate the ‘Mode’ button on the side of the thermometer. Press the button until you find your desired temperature taking mode for Body or Food/Liquid use. There are 4 modes. For Body or Food/Liquid daytime use, you will hear a beep and the display will light up. For Body or Food/Liquid nighttime use, the beep is muted. A ‘moon’ symbol appears in nighttime mode.

settings.title: Does Otto recline?
settings.content: The versatile Otto offers a full range of recline positions that allow you to position to your liking.

settings.title: Can you provide some helpful measurements so I can make sure Otto fits me and my child?
settings.content: When Otto is fully unfolded, the handle is 40.5" from the floor, a height that comfortably accommodates most adults. The measurement from the seat bottom to the canopy is 29" and the measurement from the seat bottom to the top of the harness (at the shoulder) is 15", leaving plenty of room for your child to grow.

settings.title: What is the diameter of the tires?
settings.content: Designed for maximum maneuverability, Otto's front tires measure 5.7" across. The rear tires are slightly larger than the front tires, measuring 6.3" across.
